name: Libratum
description:
Libratum is a 2-4 player fighting game

It is in early development stages at the moment but thoughts and bug reports are appreciated. If you have a win streak of 2 or more the game will start to modify your place to make the game harder for you to play.

Keyboard and at least 1 controller is required to play

Controls 
WASD - Move player
Space - Jump
J - Attack

Left analog - Move
A - Jump
X - Attack

If you play the game please fill in this survey in response that would help out a lot 

https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/FZRFDGM
